page.title: 09The Arts
page.content: In{Haslingden}there is no theatre but a public hall and a parish hall. The{ {public hall}has a stage and various items are staged for the public such as pantomimes, drama clubs, music festivals, poetry readings, exhibitions and performances by local dance schools. The{parish hall}has the same function. The local Townswomen Guild in Haslingden give lectures, local guides, scouts and brownies perform their gangshows here. There is also a video club in the town which shows films as do some public houses. In{Haslingden Library} occasional exhibitions of paintings are held as there is no art gallery.
